name: Roots of Chaos
description:
Roots of Chaos is an Action, Defence (Farming) Game, where you play an (evil?) mage who just wants to grow special plants to acquire new magical knowledge.
'The Holy Order' is trying to prevent you from doing so, because the ancient magical knowledge you seek is corrupting the land.

Everything except the Music was made from scratch for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.
Theme: Let there be Chaos!

Made by: HarkDev, Ikea (Our first Game Jam!)

Main Menu Music: https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/royalty-free-music/download/8-bit-menu/287
Defence Music: https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/royalty-free-music/download/a-bit-of-hope/565
